task_background: Prepare the IT maintenance room for a critical system audit by ensuring all equipment is functional, organized, and compliant.

tasks.task_description: Place the AT job punch cards (at_job_punch_cards_1) on the central workbench (central_workbench_1).
Place the shattered mug (shattered_mug_1) in the storage & spare parts corner (storage_spare_parts_corner).
Find the heaviest, metal object in the legacy server bay and place it in the modern server rack cluster.
Find the dusty, metal trophy (dusty_trophy_1) and place it on the bulletin board (bulletin_board_1).
Use the multimeter (multimeter_1) to measure the network switch (network_switch_1).
Use the manual override key (manual_override_key_1) to open the drawer under console (drawer_under_console_1) and retrieve the key.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the blade server rack (blade_server_rack_1).
Move the heavy-duty shelving unit (heavy_duty_shelving_unit_1) to the legacy server bay.
Move the decommissioned server (decommissioned_server_1) to the workbench & documentation hub.
